name: Akuto: Mad World
detailed_description:
Fast-Paced Arena Action

Akuto: Mad World is an award-nominated, isometric, fast-paced action game where players compete with swords and guns in intense versus matches.

The game is set on low poly, diorama arenas where players have to not only watch out for opponents, but also for the environment from killing them.


SWORDS

Your sword is your best friend. Their sword is your worst enemy.


GUNS

Too far to hit them with your sword? Then try shooting at them with one of the many different bullets!


ENVIRONMENT

Trick your enemies by using the environment and let natural order take place.


MINIGAMES

Tired of killing? Bored of winning all the time? Then try out one of the minigames!


FAMILY FRIENDLY

Beat your kids (figuratively) and show them who rules your household.

Key Features

  • Fight in over 10 different dynamic levels.
  • Hone your killing skills in the procedurally-generated singleplayer mode.
  • Join with up to four players to take on survival mode and aim to become number 1 on the leaderboards.
  • Fight against your friends in local multiplayer, online* multiplayer, or play against the bots in one of the many versus modes.
  • Tired of the same, old levels? Then go create your own levels using the in-game level editor and upload them onto the Steam Workshop!

*Online mode is still in beta

short_description: Akuto: Mad World is an award-nominated, isometric, fast-paced action game where players compete with swords and guns in intense versus matches.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish*, Dutch*, Korean*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support
reviews:
“It's all about making a bloody mess of your friends”
IndieGames

“A few goes in, but only one stands alive”
Future Beta Gamer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® Vista
  • Processor: 1.6GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10
  • Processor: 2GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.7 or later
  • Processor: 1.6GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.11 or later
  • Processor: 2.6GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:

  • Processor: 1.6GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
